testcase.name: Adopting one puppy from the website
testcase.system-out: Given I am on the puppy adoption site "http://localhost:3000"...............passed When I click the View Details button for "Brook"............................passed And I click the Adopt Me! button............................................passed And I click the Complete the Adoption button................................passed And I complete the adoption using this information "Mr. Cheezy", "123 Main Street", "cheezy@mail.com", "Check".passed Then I should see "Thank you for adopting a puppy!".........................passed
